verses.text: \w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w time|strong="H8145"\w*,

“\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w that|strong="H5892"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* message \w that|strong="H5892"\w* \w I|strong="H6965"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w started|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded. \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w large|strong="H1419"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*’ \w journey|strong="H4109"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* cross \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* going \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*’s \w journey|strong="H4109"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w*, “Forty \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w overthrown|strong="H2015"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* people \w of|strong="H7121"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w* believed God; \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* ordered \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w least|strong="H6996"\w* \w of|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w came|strong="H5060"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w took|strong="H4428"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* robe, dressed \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* ashes.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1241"\w* made \w this|strong="H4428"\w* \w proclamation|strong="H2199"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* published \w it|strong="H8354"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*: “\w By|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w decree|strong="H2940"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H4428"\w* \w nobles|strong="H1419"\w*: \w People|strong="H2199"\w*, beast, \w herd|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* must \w not|strong="H4325"\w* \w taste|strong="H2938"\w* \w anything|strong="H3972"\w*; let \w them|strong="H7462"\w* \w not|strong="H4325"\w* \w eat|strong="H7462"\w* \w nor|strong="H1241"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H7725"\w* \w both|strong="H4480"\w* \w people|strong="H3709"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* animals \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w let|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w earnestly|strong="H2394"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* God; \w let|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* each \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w deeds|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w which|strong="H7451"\w* \w they|strong="H1870"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w doing|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w knows|strong="H3045"\w*? \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H4310"\w* \w relent|strong="H5162"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* avert \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H2740"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H4310"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* die.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w course|strong="H1870"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w relented|strong="H5162"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w which|strong="H1992"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.
